scripts.lint:check: npm run prettier:check && npm run eslint:check
scripts.publish-to-npm: echo "ENSURE YOU ARE LOGGED IN TO NPM" && HUSKY=0 np
scripts.preversion: npm run clean && npm run install:prod && npm run build && npm run lint:check && npm run test && npm run prune:prod

dependencies-notes.husky: Used to automatically run GIT pre commit hooks. This MUST remain in the prod-dependency section, otherwise the publish-to-npm script will fail when it tries to bump versions and it needs to commit, but dev dependencies will have been cleaned up at this point
